name: Rebekah Laskin
biography:
Jewelry designer. Received BFA in Gold and Silversmithing from SUNY New Paltz, NY.
Rebekah studied with Robert Ebendorf and Kurt Matzdorf. She was employed at M & J Savitt Inc. as a jewelry and assistant shop manager and later at Irving Lang Inc. as a mold-maker and jeweler. She has taught in New York City and has exhibited in California and Oregon.
